Sockets

Class DotsServerClientParent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sockets.DotsServerClientParent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DotsClient, DotsServer

    public abstract class DotsServerClientParent
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class of Dots Server and Client, so that code duplication is eliminated. Primarily for instantiating of the server and client, and to throw an exception if no listeners are set for the server and client Created by JiaHao on 31/3/15.
